title: Agia Napa
description: AKSM signed the contract for the project of ” Development of Ayia Napa Marina” in Cyprus with the company ‘TERNA OVERSEAS LTD’. Therefore, the construction of Ayia Napa Marina, with a 600 berth is part of a broader world class waterfront development consisting of a variety of commercial, residential, cultural and sport uses. More specifically the infrastructures includes: the marina with 600 berth, Villas, 2 Towers and Commercial Buildings.
description3: The luxury project of the development in Ayia Napa Marina is estimated with a total budget of 250 € million and will be handed over in 2021.
description2: The construction procedure is divided in 2 phases. Phase A: Includes all the marine works, infrastructures and facilities. Phase B: Includes the constructions of 2 Towers of 28 floors each and total area of 58.000 m2, a complex of 29 Villas and Commercial Buildings in the heart of Marina consisting of Retail, Food, Beverage, Event Center and Parking in an area more then 8.000 m2.

title: Greek Plenary Hall
description: AKSM has made outdoor and indoor measurements for the creation of the accurate digital model. Scan2Bim is applied for maximum efficiency and safe method in a significant difficult project.Operations for the improvement and assistance of the covering construction hall of Greek Plenary Hall.
description3: AKSM is awarded and successfully completed the challenging project of the geometry verification through Laser Scanning techniques for the covering construction hall of Greek Plenary Hall. Highly accurate operations are consisted with 3D Laser Scanner.

title: Polyethelene PE3 Unit
description: AKSM has successfully signed and completed the Scan2bim works for the construction of a Polyethelene PE3 Unit and steel strucutres erection works in the location of Litvinof, Czech Republic. AKSM provided services in the field of Quality Control of the steel structures with laser scanning techniques. First was created a concrete base with a height of 35 m. approximately. On that concrete base, steel structures erection works were located consisting the Polyethelene Unit. AKSM has performed pricise measurements with the Laser Scanner Topcon GLS-2000 providing geometry verification and supervision regarding the process of the constructions. The geometry verification determined the accuracy of the steel structures erection works and the procedure of their constructions.
description3: AKSM is awarded and successfully completed the challenging project of the geometry verification through Laser Scanning techniques for the covering construction hall of Greek Plenary Hall. Highly accurate operations are consisted with 3D Laser Scanner.

title: Athens International Airport
description: In response to European Commission Regulation requiring the upgrade of the security equipment at all European airports, Athens International Airport ( AIA) has commissioned a design study depicting the required reconfiguration of the airport’s Baggage Handling System. The BHS is located in two distinct Halls located on the Arrivals level of the Main Terminal Building. The concept has given rise to some significant changes to the existing infrastracture. AIA has also produced a new design of the steel supporting structures for this new system layout.
description3: AKSM has been awarded and successfully completed for the project Scan2Bim for BHS at Athens International Airport. For the highly digital representation AKSM has used 3D Laser Scanner and a variety of post processing programs.

title: Titan S.A factory
description: AKSM undertook the Scan2bim project of the Titan S.A factory at Kamari using 3D Laser Scanner. The installation of Titan S.A was measured with the prospect of a highly accurate digital representation ( BIM). Laser scanning is a rapid and reliable surveying method, which provides more accurate products than any other methodology. For the scope of the project AKSM has performed the scanning measurements with the Laser Scanner Topcon GLS-2000 and post- process programms. The model that appears in the featured video consists the infrastructure of Titan S.A. with accurate details of the physical shapes and is combined with colours.

title: Papastratos Museum Complex
description: AKSM assumed the project of the Scan2Bim at Piraeus Port Plaza 2 of Papastratos Museum Complex. Port Plaza 2 is an ambitious plan for the exploitation and the development of the close area at Piraeus Port. The renovation of Papastratos Museum Complex from the old warehouses to a modern office building and the erection of a new 7th floor building executed with the Laser Scanning methology for great efficiency of the BIM of the installations with precision emphasesing to the detail.
description3: AKSM successfully applied as Built surveys and Scan2Bim models according the architectural and civil needs. Laser Scanning techniques provide fast measurements, high accuracy, multiple types of designs, digital models.

title: Gold Line Underground Metro
description: Signed the project contract “ Gold Line Underground” Metro in Doha, Qatar between the consortium ALYSJ Joint Venture and AKSM. The Gold Line Underground project is the greatest and biggest part of Metro in Doha. The line crosses Doha from East to West including 13 stations designed with executive architecture, high tech technology systems emphasesing the power and the future vision of the country.
description3: AKSM provided and completed Scan2Bim applications accros the 10 stations and the 32 klm of tunnels determining a total area of 270.000 m2. For the scope of the work AKSM applied precised Laser Scanning methologies regarding the the needs of the project, which are estimated of efficiency, fast process and safety.

title: Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center
description: Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center includeS new state-of-the-art facilities for the Greek National Opera and the National Library of Greece, set within the Stavros Niarchos Park. The public site for these three projects is near the center of Athens, Greece, adjacent to the sea, covering an approximate area of  200,000 square meters. The Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center attracts patrons from Greece and around the world.  The park offers much needed open space in the city, an ideal, “green” backdrop for the Center’s educational and cultural activities. The entire project is designed to the highest standards of environmental sustainability.
description3: AKSM successfully performed Scan2Bim applications for the installations of SNCF icluding the Opera Building, the Library Building, tha CarPark Building and the Green Hill. Scan2Bim was a part of the general project for AKSM at SNCF which offered highly accurate digital representations, safety, fast post-processing regarding the huge amount of data collection.

title: AHS Ptolemais UNIV
description: AHS Ptolemais UNIV is a new project for the fifth coal-fired unit of the Ptolemais Power Station, with a generating capacity of 660 MWatts. Ptolemais Power Station is one of the biggest lignite-fired units which is owned by Public Power Corp (DEH). The plant includes many infrastructures such as 1 Cooling Tower, Boiler MEV Turbine, WFGD Unit, Waste Water Treatment Plant, Crasher Unit and Services Buildings.
description4: AKSM has signed the contract and successfully completed the Scan2Bim applications for TERNA S.A which is the developer company of the project.
description2: Scan2Bim applied at the Cooling Tower checking steo by step the constructing process and for the control of the volume as built. Secondly, AKSM has performed geometry verification of the constructions through laser scanning techniques. In addition, the geometry verification controlled the prefabricated structure pieces of the Tower. AKSM provided Scan2bim for the geometry verification of 2 Boiler Buildings with a total height of 135 m. The accurate digital model produced designs of a huge metal ladder which is installed on the Boiler Building giving acess from the ground to the top.

title: LEROY MERLIN STORE
description: CONSTRUCTION OF LEROY MERLIN STORE AT THE COMMERCIAL PARK OF ATHENS INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT – ELEFTHERIOS VENIZELOS, SPATA, ATTICA

Construction and extension of RM2 unit and spooler unit at halivourgiki S.A.
